comments.body: Seems like this method could be used to solve https://github.com/lampepfl/dotty/issues/13131 :)

diffHunk:
@@ -1,1 +378,382 @@  private def escapeJavaArray(elemTp: Type)(using Context): Type = elemTp match
    case JavaArrayType(elemTp1) => defn.ArrayOf(escapeJavaArray(elemTp1))
    case _ => elemTp

  private enum ManifestKind:
